item.title: Justin Bieber Flaunts His Abs and Tattoos During Shirtless Performance at the 2026 Grammys
item.description: The nominee took the stage in nothing but satin boxers and socks

item.title: Bad Bunny Earns a Standing Ovation from Grammys Crowd After He Starts Acceptance Speech with 'ICE Out': We're Not Savage'
item.description: The 31-year-old Puerto Rican musician took the stage on Sunday, Feb. 2, to accept the Grammy for Best Música Urbana Album for DeBÍ TiRAR MáS FOToS

item.title: Doechii Channels Isabella Rossellini's Iconic Outfit from “Death Becomes Her” with 2nd Look at the 2026 Grammys

item.title: Halle Bailey Reveals Her Son Has Started Calling Her 'Beautiful' at the 2026 Grammys (Exclusive)
item.description: The singer and actress welcomed son Halo in December 2023
